transcript: 50-year-old male industrial accident victim with crush injury to lower extremities. Patient is conscious but in severe pain. Both legs are crushed with possible compartment syndrome. Blood pressure is 95/60. Heart rate is 110. Need trauma consult for crush injury.
activation_page: Trauma consult for 50-year-old male with crush injury to lower extremities. Patient conscious, stable vitals. Possible compartment syndrome. Trauma team consultation required.
